item.title: Project Mushrooms: Fun with the mushroom dataset
item.description: In this project we dig into the mushroom data set. With very simple algorithms (decision trees) we can archive that sweat 100% accuracy. To make the experience more fun, a streamlit app is created that let’s you control a few hyperparameters of the model to see how you can maximize accuracy. If you reach 100% you get some cool balloons (yay!). The mushroom data set has been contributed to the UCI Machine Learning over 30 years ago.
